EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PAIR_Q217.Detroit_Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Analytics Innovation Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Analytics Innovation Roadshow taking place tomorrow in Detroit. For those attending the Data Science Workshop, please remember to bring your own laptop.
Date: Tuesday, 1 August 2017
Time:
8:00am - 9:00am Breakfast 9:00am - 12:15pm Sessions 12:15pm - 1:15pm Lunch 1:15pm - 5:15pm Data Science Workshop
Location:
The loft @ 1420 1420 Washington Blvd, Detroit, MI 48226 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Julian+Madison+Building+LLC/@42.3341349,-83.0526817,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x883b2d3116e05ea1:0xb6f7dc226dea6162!8m2!3d42.334131!4d-83.050493]]>)
Parking:
There are two parking garages close to the venue: 1411 Griswold St, Detroit, MI 48226 1426 Times Square, Detroit, MI 48226
Agenda:
Review the full agenda HERE <[[pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow/detroit?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=PAIR-2017]]>
If you have any questions, feel free to email Patrick Gillis at pgillis@pivotal.io <[[mailto:pgillis@pivotal.io]]>. Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
